text:
[Player] tells Akiha Gongen that they
recently encountered a fire—

name: Firefighters
text:
—Please stay calm,
and evacuate by following our guidance!

options.text: (Ask if there's anything you can do to help)
(Tell them there are people who haven't escaped)

name: Firefighter
text:
I hear there are still people who haven't escaped inside...
With our current manpower, securing an escape route is all we can do—

name: Elderly Female Firefighter?
text:
Arrived at the scene— Looks like we made it in time.
Leave the rest to me, this is my dance floor now.

The firefighter with splendid gray hair fluttering,
heads in the opposite direction of the evacuating people.

And she rescued every single one of them,
and continued to prevent the flames from reaching the evacuating people.

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
—So that's what happened.
I'm really glad you're safe, [Player].

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
And that's what got you interested!
...By the way, I might have an idea who that firefighter is.

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
Well, let's go for now.
I'm sure everyone's looking forward to meeting you!

Guided by the visibly delighted Akiha Gongen,
they immediately headed to the base of the fire brigade he belonged to.

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
Seniors! This is the otaku I was telling you about...
I mean, [Player]!

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
Nice to meet you~, [Player]-chan.
Just relax, and let's have a welcome party first, shall we?

name: Gurangatch
text:
Baatar is trying to casually skip today's training,
that's pretty insane...

name: Gurangatch
text:
Hey, nice to meet you~, [Player].
Don't worry, we'll have a proper welcome party for you.

name: Red Hood
text:
Nice to meet you, I'm Red Hood.
This old hag here is my buddy, Cinderella... our Captain.

name: Cinderella
text:
...Yes, nice to meet you.
You've introduced me without my permission again.

name: Red Hood
text:
If I don't, you'll say something like 'I don't have a name worth mentioning'.
Be careful, newbie, this old hag is pretty 'insane', yeah?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wh-What's with that look, like you're staring at prey?
I thought I was the hunter wolf, but this is...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahahaha!
Newbie... You've got yourself a good eye.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: If you don't fix that wimpy habit of yours soon, you might be the one eaten, Reddy?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-Wimpy...
I won't deny it, but please pick a better timing...

options.text: You're the one who saved me back then...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hm...? Ah, it's you!
You're the one who helped with the evacuation at the scene the other day.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You left an impression on me too.
In my hometown... I knew a similar eye of the storm.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Was that the reason you joined? What a coincidence!
I'll spoil you rotten. And I mean that literally.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: It seems like we'll get along well with you, since we joined for the same reason, right, Reddy?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah. You and I joined for the same reason.
Let's talk about it more later.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You'll find out later, but Sandra...
Cinderella is an amazing firefighter herself.
Let's work hard together to catch up to her!

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
From me as well, as a fellow fire brigade member,
let us get along together again!

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
I'd like to give you a lecture right away,
but I'm still a trainee, so I'm leaving it to my seniors.

Akiha Gongen said that and turned to
Cinderella and Red Hood.

name: Red Hood
text:
Yeah, me and the old hag will be your instructors.
...Is that right, old hag?

name: Cinderella
text:
Anyone who can dance with me at a fire is welcome.
...Though there's never been anyone like that before.

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
Alright, I'll leave it to you two then.
[Player]-chan, if it's too tough, let's slack off together—

After finishing the introductions in a friendly atmosphere,
[Player] becomes a trio with their instructor buddies.

name: Red Hood
text:
—Well then, that's it for the facility tour,
next is training... so!

name: Cinderella
text:
No need to be so tense.
A fire brigade's duty isn't just to deal with the incidents at the scenes.

name: Cinderella
text:
First, to see your aptitude,
I'll have you experience various training.
